text: KDDF is a class A radio station broadcasting out of Mecca, California. ==History== On May 19, 2015, KDDF went on the air as KHXR, switching to its current callsign a month later on June 19, 2015. ==References== ==External links== Category:Mass media in Riverside County, California Category:2015 establishments in California DDF Category:Radio stations established in 2015 DDF
title: KDDF
